net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy

Class ErrorReductionQueryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy.AbstractQueryStrategy
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
        • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.ErrorReductionQueryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IQueryStrategy, JCLAL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpectedCeroOneLossQueryStrategy, ExpectedLogLossQueryStrategy

    public abstract class ErrorReductionQueryStrategy
extends AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
    Abstract class for Error Reduction family of query strategies. All the query strategies that belong to ErrorReduction category must be extend this class. This category of query strategy measures how much its generalization error is likely to be reduced. Burr Settles. Active Learning Literature Survey. Computer Sciences Technical Report 1648, University ofWisconsinâ€“Madison. 2009.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Maria del Carmen Rodriguez Hernandez, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
